website_summaries.verdict: A thick, firm mat that gets the job done.
pros: Name tag holder allows you to personalize each mat
Dual colored mats wipe clean with soap and water
cons: Heat seal will wear out over time, eventually exposing the interior foam

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I got the four fold one. There is kind of a big gap down the middle to account for the thickness when folded. However, it doesn't seem to bother me daughter when she lies on it. It's very cushy!
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old uses this at parents day out along with a similar cover (as shown in picture). It is thick and firm enough to give him support and comfort. He is fairly picky about where he falls asleep, since he naps long and hard at PDO because of this I would highly recommend. I don't see why it won't last for several years since it is being used for its intended napping purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Soft, durable, good size and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Two year old son that goes to Mother’s Day out and he has room to grow in it. Soft and comfy. Also bought the Urban infant toddler nap mat to go over it and I’m pretty pleased with both! Now I don’t have to worry about my baby sleeping on a hard floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jo.W

customer_reviews.title: 2 Thumbs Up 👍🏽 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: This is a good nap pad. Not like the garbage they sell at Walmart. It’s alot cheaper price wise but other mats are like laying on nothing! The cushion is horrible. This mat is awesome. They cushion is nice and thick and when my son lays on it, he’s not laying on the floor! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: The mat is big and thick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nap mat for my son who is 3 years old. I bought the 4 folds premium one. I received the mat last weekend and my son hasn’t slept on it yet. I did lots of research and read lots of reviews and decided to buy the ECR4Kids mat among others because of its size and thickness. I was so excited when opening this mat and it didn’t disappoint me at all. It’s big, thick, and seems comfortable. Looks like a good quality product. It’s more cushioning than the 1inch mat. It has room when my son grows bigger and I won’t worried he won’t fit when he’s 4 or 5 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison’s mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rest pad - 2 inches looks to be very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Received this and was so happy with the thickness of this. My son will use it in school, so I am sure it will work out great. I got the 2 inch pad.
customer_reviews.author: TAB

customer_reviews.title: Comfy enough for daycare floors!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is EXACTLY what we needed for our Daughters daycare. It’s thinkenough to keep her comfy. We tried two other brands and nothing compared to this one! Worth the money spent. She went from sleeping 1hr to almost 3! Her teachers and I are both thrilled with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kat B

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and not that thick at all ended up returning and getting a better one
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Kid likes it. Easy to clean. I’ve even laid on it with child and it holds up nice. Also my kid is super tall for his age and he is very comfortable there.
customer_reviews.author: A. Justicia

customer_reviews.title: Pay more for better quality
customer_reviews.text: It lasted enough for a 2 year old. It slowly but surely fell apart, the rims opened up and it was very flimsy. It had enough cushion to sit for a while but it could be thicker for better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for road trip travel
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my 2 year old to nap while away from home. It's too bulky to pack for air travel but works well for car travel. I also purchased a cover to make it more comfortable for my son who is a belly sleeper. We put velcro in between the folds so it doesn't separate when it's laid flat. Not necessary but we wanted to make it as similar as possible to the one piece nap mat my son uses at day care.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Great for nap time at Pre K
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves it during nap time at Pre-K.. fits perfectly and the 2" thickness makes his nap time much more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Michael Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. We use it everyday as a changing pad because it is a nice wipable surface. It's comfortable as well. Sometimes after a change our son just keeps laying on it. He is one.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Not actually 48 inches.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular mat over the much less expensive ones at Walmart specifically because it says it is 48 inches long and they are 45 inches. My child is 48 inches tall and I’m disappointed to see that her feet hang several inches off the end of the mat. Laying it flat and measuring it I got 46 inches. Even pulling and stretching it out it’s still only 47 inches.
customer_reviews.author: MKS

customer_reviews.title: Don't skip out on this
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very comfortable, I would lay on it if it was my size! It's durable and I will use it for my other child once my 1st is done with it. very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Crusenberry

customer_reviews.title: Great for Nap time at Grammy’s.
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a nap mat for Grammy’s house. It’s tucked into a little teepee so my 3 yo granddaughter can catch some good zzzzzzzs. It’s a great transition to the twin bed I’ll eventually need to get.
customer_reviews.author: M.R. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Moderate price, moderate product. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly represented. They're rather inexpensive tri-fold mats with easily-cleaned surfaces and moderate padding. I have a home daycare and the kids are okay with them. I'd rather afford sturdier ones with a more appealing texture than the slick plastic, but these keep the kids off the hardwood floor. Best with a sheet or blanket between the child and the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for preschool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son for preschool nap time. I wanted something bigger than 1 inch and this didn't disappoint. It has plenty of cushion and, while only a 3 fold, is a good size for him. He's four and tall so it was something I worried about but it is hard to find a 4 fold in a 2 inch mat. He has used it since August and so far there are no rips or tears in it so it's holding up pretty well. It's also easy to clean and sanitize.
customer_reviews.author: skydivegirl24

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick pad and easy to fold and tuck away. Perfect for daycare naps! Little girl was so excited when it came in the mail!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My kids that I watch LOVE them. They get on them and are knocked out. So I’m guessing they’re comfortable because when it’s time to wake up it takes them a minute to get up. Lol. I spray them every time they get up with bleach and water in a bottle as well as I wipe them down with a towel that has water and soap on it. Super easy to clean. Also easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so easy to take care of any use. Just the right size for my 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Demoney

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great sleeping mat for our pre-schooler! We are very happy with the thickness and comfort it gives our child. We are very happy to find it!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A.

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality mat - too large for school cubbie
customer_reviews.text: This mat is the highest quality mat I've seen, the vinyl will wear and clean well. However, the size was a problem for her school. It is too large to be easily stored. I returned it but was sorely tempted to keep it as an extra bed option for sleepovers.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Its was great just as advertised box was messed up but product was perfect! So who cares unless you care about the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but HUGe
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and to sleep on. Well constructed. However, it is HUGE, especially when folded. Something to consider for storage and/or transposition.
customer_reviews.author: Christian R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the 1 inch mats or mats available in Walmart. Love that it is GreenGuard Gold Certified!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Dale Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great thick mats
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 4 year old's nap time at Pre-K. It's much wider and much more comfortable than the thinner ones at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Bubblegum

customer_reviews.title: 2 time buyer
customer_reviews.text: We have bought this twice for our daughter. It holds up well- we get a new mat for each school year.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: came with huge cut in the mattress and plastic packaging.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

customer_reviews.title: Especially for Grandma's Boy
customer_reviews.text: For my grandson to use in Pre-K and probably also Kindergarten. The one inch thick is too thin. The size is a little larger and is perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for a good price!!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed to do. My son needed a sleeping mat for his class, this is it!! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Somkhit Phosavath

customer_reviews.title: seems durable, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: quality of material seems durable. Admit of foam feels nice and comfortable. The mats plastic fabric feels a bit thin but only time will tell if it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great mat!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great mat!!! Much better than the kindermats! Worth the extra money. Could even be used as a small tumbling mat!
customer_reviews.author: Ashkie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this mat I bought one for my daughter for “rest time” at school and one for her to do gymnastics with at home. It is huge and very durable and lots of cushion!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for tumbling, but would work for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this more for a tumbling mat. The gaps between the mats are too big for that. It is very soft, just not quite what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pre-K
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son who is in pre-k. Wipes off easily and folds up nice for space saving.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Toper

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: This product ripped 10 minn after being open. Not sure what you could use this for. I have a tiny grandbaby and if it rips from that it's not worth the buy. What a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: nichole c.

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my 2 year old son.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the size and thickness of the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Joshan Barry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it! I want to take a nap on it!
customer_reviews.author: S & S Brudz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Material is fine but these mats crack and RIP in the folds and around the edges where they are sealed together
customer_reviews.author: barbie muir

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and comfy for the kids
customer_reviews.text: got these for my daycare.very sturdy and comfy for the kids.they do make noise if they move around a lot.I had thin sheets for them so they don't lay on the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Marinoff

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good padding. Easy to clean. Not sure on durability yet. There is a spot for a name tag but no name tag
customer_reviews.author: NikaB

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little rest mat
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little rest mat. I folds up more compactly but I wish the foam was a bit more dense.
customer_reviews.author: R. Keesaman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for the play room. Tumbling and restling
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra thick and durable
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these extra thick and durable nap mats we’ve used them at school and camping. Extra cushion and strong
customer_reviews.author: Rush28

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to use at daycare. It’s been good with him using it. They love it and asked where I purchased for them to buy more. It was a good buy for me
customer_reviews.author: Osmana

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for toddlers naps or play room, it’s very thick and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Lina Palacio

customer_reviews.title: If you have a tall child you might want to read up measurements before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and super thick padding for kids to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Courteney2

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy.
customer_reviews.text: All Matts are torn now in a very short time. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great for nap time
customer_reviews.text: My son needed this for daycare. This one is actually better, thicker and more comfortable than the ones other kids in his class have.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: This mat is on the pricey side and arrived with a tear. Since my son needs it this week I don’t have time to return. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya M Cheatwood

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4year old to sleep ok on it school. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thick enough but soft. My kid loves it for her nap time at the preschool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of the mats. All 5 are literally coming apart at the seams in less than one year.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Harney

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for kids.
customer_reviews.text: The mat is great for our grand daughter to take naps on when she is visiting.
customer_reviews.author: William Costagliola

customer_reviews.title: fantastic mats
customer_reviews.text: These mats are very thick and of great quality. The material that these mats are made of are very durable. I had kinder mats that I had gotten at target and they were very thin and always were ripping at the seams and need to be replaced. I have used them in my daycare for about month now and I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: michelle l matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughters kindergarten class and it was exactly what she needed for her rest time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, within two months all of the mats I ...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, within two months all of the mats I ordered for my school (ten of them) had ripped in every crease.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for daycare
customer_reviews.text: My son was starting daycare and my husband and I didn't want him sleeping on the floor during nap time. I searched high and low for a light, easy to clean, cost-effective solution and this rest mat fit the bill. The only thing is it was sold in a pack of 4, but it worked out anyway since we use the extra mats for gymnastics at home. Thanks for the great product all around.
customer_reviews.author: Trang P.

customer_reviews.title: best deal in town
customer_reviews.text: Great value, 2 inches thick. WOW. the product arrived so quickly and in Excelkent condition
customer_reviews.author: Talibah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice mats, didn't need 6, but they are good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small to medium dog create beds
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect as a dog create mat just cut it to fit.. now I don't have to wash the bed every time they have an accident...
customer_reviews.author: Mendrick g.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seem sturdy...concerned about splits I'm starting to see after only 4 weeks of preschool use.
customer_reviews.author: Karl & Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mats started ripping on the seams after just a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: libby stuart

customer_reviews.title: Best nap mat
customer_reviews.text: Best nap mats- I own a preschool and have bought many different nap mats throughout the years, these are the only ones that actually last a whole school year (with proper care, they'll last even longer), they don't rip like the cheap ones. Definitely worth spending more money on. Look no further this is the real deal, quality rest mat, best part our students bodies have room to stretch on these.
customer_reviews.author: damian

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: we bought these to use at a school and we are very happy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KF Jacksonville

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Seems comfortable, the two inch padding might be a little much on a flat floor, it doesn't compress that much, so will probably try the 1 inch version if I need another one. The gaps between the sections are a little bigger than expected, but my 3 year old still likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer of Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thick for laying on hard floor. Quality product. Great for kindergarden nap mat. Plan to have it last through all kids. Item shipped as described.
customer_reviews.author: lisa rivera skubal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mats are very well made. Received them in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my in home daycare and they work great no problems so far! Will buy more soon! A+++
customer_reviews.author: carlos m espinal

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this rest mat
customer_reviews.text: my kid loves this rest mat. soft, comfortable, light weight, and easy to fold. would buy it again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: rhbklyn9

customer_reviews.title: New mat
customer_reviews.text: I got my mat on wednesday and i am excited to sleep on it very great to get. I slept on this mat last very great quality
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Doonan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for daycare mat we were required to bring.
customer_reviews.author: Cara B Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Bad mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat was not what I was expecting! It looks sturdy in the picture, but it's not at all! Very flimsy, and squishy, and bendable! I wouldn't recommend it if you are in need of padding!
customer_reviews.author: marcela

customer_reviews.title: It's okay depending what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dirty with sticker residue on the edge. There was no plastic wrapping on it, arrived just in a shipping box, so given how dirty and dusty it was it was probably sitting in the warehouse unprotected. The mat is not flat across, there are gaps in between each section which is hard to see from the picture. As far as use for a nap mat it does fold nice and is fairly comfortable. It has some squish to it, not firm.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't been opened yet. Will be opened at a later date. Looked OK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to manage
customer_reviews.text: This is product is thick, easy to manage and serving it's purpose exactly well.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job well
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. My son likes it. Easy to wipe and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good size and thicker then the average mat.😍😍
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger then I expected but that's what I wanted a big mat. I love it great quality. 😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Daeann

product_meta.title: ECR4Kids Premium 3-Fold Daycare Rest Mat, Blue and Red, 1" Thick (5-Pack)
product_meta.description:
Size:3-Fold — 1" Thick| Style:5-PackMake rest time comfortable for preschool age children with the ECR4Kids folding rest mat. Each 3-fold section mat features a 1-inch dense foam core covered in a heat-sealed and waterproof two-color sided vinyl covering. A clear plastic name tag holder helps children identify their personal mat. Rest mats fold in three sections space saving storage. Each mat measures 24 x 48 x 1 inch (WxLxH) and comes in a pack of five. With a concentration on the Pre K-12 sector, ECR4Kids offers a wide range of products from tables, chairs and desks to cots, mats and a variety of storage cases in solid wood as well as scratch resistant double-sided laminate.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Make rest time comfortable and clean up easy with the ECR4Kids folding rest mat. Each three –section mat features dense foam core and waterproof vinyl covering. A clear plastic name tag holder helps children identify their personal mat. Rest mats fold in three sections to store easily and save space. Each mat measures 48 Inch wide by 24 Inch deep by 1 inch high and comes in a case pack of five.
feature_bullets: Premium Rest Time — quality rest mat with a high density foam core are ideal for daycares, preschools and homes
Folding Rest Mat — rest mats feature easy-fold seams for convenient storage and transportation
Sanitary Design — two-tone mat lets you use one side on the floor and the other side for sleeping
Low Maintenance — colorful covers are durable and easy to clean; just wipe with a mild soap-and-water solution
Certified and Safe — GREENGUARD[GOLD] Certified for minimal chemical emissions into indoor air
Overall Dimensions — 48" W x 24" D x 1" H, 1.2 lbs (each)
No Assembly Required — mats ship fully assembled
